mapper.select: SELECT LR_NO , L_THUMBNAIL , L_TITLE , L_CONTENT , LC_NAME , LT_NAME , LR_CAPACITY , LR_COUNT , LR_START_DATE , LR_END_DATE , LR_NUMBER , LR_DAY , LR_START_TIME , LR_END_TIME , LR_FEE , INSTRUCTOR_NAME , PROFILE_PHOTO , BIRTH_DATE , INSTRUCTOR_PHONE , CAREER FROM LECTURE_REGISTRATION O JOIN LECTURE C1 ON(O.L_NO = C1.L_NO) JOIN LECTURE_CLASSIFICATION C2 ON(C1.LC_NO = C2.LC_NO) JOIN LECTURE_TARGET C3 ON(C1.LT_NO = C3.LT_NO) JOIN INSTRUCTOR C4 ON(O.INSTRUCTOR_NO = C4.INSTRUCTOR_NO) WHERE LR_NO = #{lrNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LECTURE_BUY ( R_NO , LR_NO , LB_STATUS , LB_ENROLL_DATE , LB_MODIFY_DATE ) VALUES ( #{rNo} , #{lr} , DEFAULT , SYSDATE , SYSDATE )
